description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 18/6958/HSE dated 26/11/2018 for ` Roof extension with 3no. front roof lights, 3no. rear rooflights and enlarged rear dormer window to facilitate a loft conversion. Single storey rear and first floor rear extensions, 2 balconies above single storey rear extensions at first floor level, formation of pitched roof to replace existing on side outbuilding' Lift overrun at second floor rear roof level`. Amendments include remove the main roof enlargement on both sides to allow creation of new enlarged loft. Retain the main roof as existing. Remove the new addition loft with pitched roof on the outbuilding. Retain the outbuilding flat roof as existing. Remove No 2 balconies/terrace at the first floor. Remove the roof extension to first floor left wing. Retain the left-wing roof as existing. Alter the first-floor rear extension right wing visible from South West Elevation and South East Elevation. Reduce the roof ridge to match left wing height and increase the depth by nom. 1.2m. No 2 new skylight are also proposed on South East Elevation. Remove the dormer window enlargement an lift overrun
